headline.main: THIRD NORSE SHIP IS SUNK; Fourth One of 11 Fleeing Sweden Reported Aground -- Spies Blamed

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Sweden, April 2 -- German spies in Sweden are responsible for the sinking of three or four of the eleven Free Norwegian ships that made a dash for Britain from Goeteborg on Tuesday night, it was asserted today by the Nya Dagligt Allehanda and by the new Social Democratic evening newspaper, the Aftontidningen.
abstract: Buccaneer and Skytteren sunk, 3d disabled, contradictory repts on 4th, Lionel and Dicto return to port; interception by German warships in Kattegat laid to spies; Brit reaction
